verses.verse: וַיֵּ֥לֶךְ <WH1980> went אִ֖ישׁ <WH376> a man מִבֵּ֣ית <WH1004> of the house לֵוִ֑י <WH3878> of Levi וַיִּקַּ֖ח <WH3947> and took אֶת־ <WH853> בַּת־ <WH1323> [to wife] a daughter לֵוִֽי׃ <WH3878> of Levi

וַתַּ֥הַר <WH2029> conceived הָאִשָּׁ֖ה <WH802> And the woman וַתֵּ֣לֶד <WH3205> and bare בֵּ֑ן <WH1121> a son וַתֵּ֤רֶא <WH7200> and when she saw אֹתוֹ֙ <WH853> כִּי־ <WH3588> for ט֣וֹב <WH2896> him that he [was a] goodly ה֔וּא <WH1931> she וַֽתִּצְפְּנֵ֖הוּ <WH6845> [child] she hid שְׁלֹשָׁ֥ה <WH7969> him three יְרָחִֽים׃ <WH3391> months

וְלֹא־ <WH3808> no יָכְלָ֣ה <WH3201> And when she could עוֹד֮ <WH5750> not longer הַצְּפִינוֹ֒ <WH6845> hide וַתִּֽקַּֽח־ <WH3947> him she took לוֹ֙ תֵּ֣בַת <WH8392> for him an ark גֹּ֔מֶא <WH1573> of bulrushes וַתַּחְמְרָ֥ה <WH2560> and daubed בַחֵמָ֖ר <WH2564> it with slime וּבַזָּ֑פֶת <WH2203> and with pitch וַתָּ֤שֶׂם <WH7760> and put בָּהּ֙ אֶת־ <WH853> הַיֶּ֔לֶד <WH3206> the child וַתָּ֥שֶׂם <WH7760> therein and she laid בַּסּ֖וּף <WH5488> [it] in the flags עַל־ <WH5921> by שְׂפַ֥ת <WH8193> brink הַיְאֹֽר׃ <WH2975> by the river's
וַתֵּתַצַּ֥ב <WH3320> stood אֲחֹת֖וֹ <WH269> And his sister מֵרָחֹ֑ק <WH7350> afar off לְדֵעָ֕ה <WH3045> to wit מַה־ <WH4100> what יֵּעָשֶׂ֖ה <WH6213> what would be done לֽוֹ׃

וַתֵּ֤רֶד <WH3381> came down בַּת־ <WH1323> And the daughter פַּרְעֹה֙ <WH6547> of Pharaoh לִרְחֹ֣ץ <WH7364> to wash עַל־ <WH5921> at הַיְאֹ֔ר <WH2975> [herself] at the river וְנַעֲרֹתֶ֥יהָ <WH5291> and her maidens הֹלְכֹ֖ת <WH1980> walked עַל־ <WH5921> and יַ֣ד <WH3027> side הַיְאֹ֑ר <WH2975> along by the river's וַתֵּ֤רֶא <WH7200> and when she saw אֶת־ <WH853> הַתֵּבָה֙ <WH8392> the ark בְּת֣וֹךְ <WH8432> among הַסּ֔וּף <WH5488> the flags וַתִּשְׁלַ֥ח <WH7971> she sent אֶת־ <WH853> אֲמָתָ֖הּ <WH519> her maid וַתִּקָּחֶֽהָ <WH3947> to fetch

וַתִּפְתַּח֙ <WH6605> And when she had opened וַתִּרְאֵ֣הוּ <WH7200> [it] she saw אֶת־ <WH853> הַיֶּ֔לֶד <WH3206> the child וְהִנֵּה־ <WH2009> and behold נַ֖עַר <WH5288> and behold the babe בֹּכֶ֑ה <WH1058> wept וַתַּחְמֹ֣ל <WH2550> And she had compassion עָלָ֔יו <WH5921> on וַתֹּ֕אמֶר <WH559> on him and said מִיַּלְדֵ֥י <WH3206> children הָֽעִבְרִ֖ים <WH5680> This [is one] of the Hebrews' זֶֽה׃ <WH2088> This

וַתֹּ֣אמֶר <WH559> Then said אֲחֹתוֹ֮ <WH269> his sister אֶל־ <WH413> about בַּת־ <WH1323> daughter פַּרְעֹה֒ <WH6547> to Pharaoh's הַאֵלֵ֗ךְ <WH1980> go וְקָרָ֤אתִי <WH7121> and call לָךְ֙ אִשָּׁ֣ה <WH802> women מֵינֶ֔קֶת <WH3243> to thee a nurse מִ֖ן <WH4480> from הָעִבְרִיֹּ֑ת <WH5680> of the Hebrew וְתֵינִ֥ק <WH3243> that she may nurse לָ֖ךְ אֶת־ <WH853> הַיָּֽלֶד׃ <WH3206> the child

וַתֹּֽאמֶר־ <WH559> said לָ֥הּ בַּת־ <WH1323> daughter פַּרְעֹ֖ה <WH6547> And Pharaoh's לֵ֑כִי <WH1980> to her Go וַתֵּ֙לֶךְ֙ <WH1980> went הָֽעַלְמָ֔ה <WH5959> And the maid וַתִּקְרָ֖א <WH7121> and called אֶת־ <WH853> אֵ֥ם <WH517> mother הַיָּֽלֶד׃ <WH3206> the child's

וַתֹּ֧אמֶר <WH559> said לָ֣הּ בַּת־ <WH1323> daughter פַּרְעֹ֗ה <WH6547> And Pharaoh's הֵילִ֜יכִי <WH1980> to her Take אֶת־ <WH853> הַיֶּ֤לֶד <WH3206> this child הַזֶּה֙ <WH2088> this וְהֵינִקִ֣הוּ <WH3243> and nurse לִ֔י וַאֲנִ֖י <WH589> I אֶתֵּ֣ן <WH5414> it for me and I will give אֶת־ <WH853> שְׂכָרֵ֑ךְ <WH7939> [thee] thy wages וַתִּקַּ֧ח <WH3947> took הָאִשָּׁ֛ה <WH802> And the woman הַיֶּ֖לֶד <WH3206> the child וַתְּנִיקֵֽהוּ׃ <WH5134> and nursed

וַיִגְדַּ֣ל <WH1431> grew הַיֶּ֗לֶד <WH3206> And the child וַתְּבִאֵ֙הוּ֙ <WH935> and she brought לְבַת־ <WH1323> daughter פַּרְעֹ֔ה <WH6547> him unto Pharaoh's וַֽיְהִי־ <WH1961> became לָ֖הּ לְבֵ֑ן <WH1121> and he became her son וַתִּקְרָ֤א <WH7121> And she called שְׁמוֹ֙ <WH8034> his name מֹשֶׁ֔ה <WH4872> Moses וַתֹּ֕אמֶר <WH559> and she said כִּ֥י <WH3588> Because מִן־ <WH4480> out הַמַּ֖יִם <WH4325> him out of the water מְשִׁיתִֽהוּ׃ <WH4871> Because I drew

וַיְהִ֣י ׀ <WH1961> came בַּיָּמִ֣ים <WH3117> And it came to pass in those days הָהֵ֗ם <WH1992> those וַיִּגְדַּ֤ל <WH1431> was grown מֹשֶׁה֙ <WH4872> when Moses וַיֵּצֵ֣א <WH3318> that he went out אֶל־ <WH413> to אֶחָ֔יו <WH251> unto his brethren וַיַּ֖רְא <WH7200> and looked בְּסִבְלֹתָ֑ם <WH5450> on their burdens וַיַּרְא֙ <WH7200> and he spied אִ֣ישׁ <WH376> an מִצְרִ֔י <WH4713> Egyptian מַכֶּ֥ה <WH5221> smiting אִישׁ־ <WH376> a עִבְרִ֖י <WH5680> an Hebrew מֵאֶחָֽיו׃ <WH251> one of his brethren

וַיִּ֤פֶן <WH6437> And he looked כֹּה֙ <WH3541> this way וָכֹ֔ה <WH3541> and that way וַיַּ֖רְא <WH7200> and when he saw כִּ֣י <WH3588> for אֵ֣ין <WH369> there אִ֑ישׁ <WH376> that [there was] no man וַיַּךְ֙ <WH5221> he slew אֶת־ <WH853> הַמִּצְרִ֔י <WH4713> the Egyptian וַֽיִּטְמְנֵ֖הוּ <WH2934> and hid בַּחֽוֹל׃ <WH2344> him in the sand

וַיֵּצֵא֙ <WH3318> And when he went out בַּיּ֣וֹם <WH3117> day הַשֵּׁנִ֔י <WH8145> the second וְהִנֵּ֛ה <WH2009> and behold שְׁנֵֽי־ <WH8147> behold two אֲנָשִׁ֥ים <WH376> he עִבְרִ֖ים <WH5680> of the Hebrews נִצִּ֑ים <WH5327> strove וַיֹּ֙אמֶר֙ <WH559> together and he said לָֽרָשָׁ֔ע <WH7563> to him that did the wrong לָ֥מָּה <WH4100> Why תַכֶּ֖ה <WH5221> Wherefore smitest רֵעֶֽךָ׃ <WH7453> brother

וַ֠יֹּאמֶר <WH559> And he said מִ֣י <WH4310> Who שָֽׂמְךָ֞ <WH7760> Who made לְאִ֨ישׁ <WH376> thee שַׂ֤ר <WH8269> a prince וְשֹׁפֵט֙ <WH8199> and a judge עָלֵ֔ינוּ <WH5921> over הַלְהָרְגֵ֙נִי֙ <WH2026> thou to kill אַתָּ֣ה <WH859> are you אֹמֵ֔ר <WH559> over us? intendest כַּאֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> you הָרַ֖גְתָּ <WH2026> me as thou killedst אֶת־ <WH853> הַמִּצְרִ֑י <WH4713> Egyptian וַיִּירָ֤א <WH3372> feared מֹשֶׁה֙ <WH4872> Moses וַיֹּאמַ֔ר <WH559> and said אָכֵ֖ן <WH403> Surely נוֹדַ֥ע <WH3045> is known הַדָּבָֽר׃ <WH1697> this thing

וַיִּשְׁמַ֤ע <WH8085> heard פַּרְעֹה֙ <WH6547> Now when Pharaoh אֶת־ <WH853> הַדָּבָ֣ר <WH1697> this thing הַזֶּ֔ה <WH2088> of this וַיְבַקֵּ֖שׁ <WH1245> he sought לַהֲרֹ֣ג <WH2026> to slay אֶת־ <WH853> מֹשֶׁ֑ה <WH4872> Moses וַיִּבְרַ֤ח <WH1272> fled מֹשֶׁה֙ <WH4872> But Moses מִפְּנֵ֣י <WH6440> from the face פַרְעֹ֔ה <WH6547> of Pharaoh וַיֵּ֥שֶׁב <WH3427> and dwelt בְּאֶֽרֶץ־ <WH776> in the land מִדְיָ֖ן <WH4080> of Midian וַיֵּ֥שֶׁב <WH3427> and he sat down עַֽל־ <WH5921> by הַבְּאֵֽר׃ <WH875> by a well

וּלְכֹהֵ֥ן <WH3548> Now the priest מִדְיָ֖ן <WH4080> of Midian שֶׁ֣בַע <WH7651> had seven בָּנ֑וֹת <WH1323> daughters וַתָּבֹ֣אנָה <WH935> and they came וַתִּדְלֶ֗נָה <WH1802> and drew וַתְּמַלֶּ֙אנָה֙ <WH4390> [water] and filled אֶת־ <WH853> הָ֣רְהָטִ֔ים <WH7298> the troughs לְהַשְׁק֖וֹת <WH8248> to water צֹ֥אן <WH6629> flock אֲבִיהֶֽן׃ <WH1> their father's

וַיָּבֹ֥אוּ <WH935> came הָרֹעִ֖ים <WH7462> And the shepherds וַיְגָרְשׁ֑וּם <WH1644> and drove them away וַיָּ֤קָם <WH6965> stood up מֹשֶׁה֙ <WH4872> but Moses וַיּ֣וֹשִׁעָ֔ן <WH3467> and helped וַיַּ֖שְׁקְ <WH8248> them and watered אֶת־ <WH853> צֹאנָֽם׃ <WH6629> their flock

וַתָּבֹ֕אנָה <WH935> And when they came אֶל־ <WH413> to רְעוּאֵ֖ל <WH7467> to Reuel אֲבִיהֶ֑ן <WH1> their father וַיֹּ֕אמֶר <WH559> he said מַדּ֛וּעַ <WH4069> How מִהַרְתֶּ֥ן <WH4116> so soon בֹּ֖א <WH935> [is it that] ye are come הַיּֽוֹם׃ <WH3117> age

וַתֹּאמַ֕רְןָ <WH559> And they said אִ֣ישׁ <WH376> an מִצְרִ֔י <WH4713> Egyptian הִצִּילָ֖נוּ <WH5337> delivered מִיַּ֣ד <WH3027> us out of the hand הָרֹעִ֑ים <WH7462> of the shepherds וְגַם־ <WH1571> and what דָּלֹ֤ה <WH1802> and also drew דָלָה֙ <WH1802> [water] enough לָ֔נוּ וַיַּ֖שְׁקְ <WH8248> for us and watered אֶת־ <WH853> הַצֹּֽאן׃ <WH6629> the flock

וַיֹּ֥אמֶר <WH559> And he said אֶל־ <WH413> to his בְּנֹתָ֖יו <WH1323> unto his daughters וְאַיּ֑וֹ <WH346> where לָ֤מָּה <WH4100> Why זֶּה֙ <WH2088> he עֲזַבְתֶּ֣ן <WH5800> And where [is] he? why [is] it [that] ye have left אֶת־ <WH853> הָאִ֔ישׁ <WH376> the man קִרְאֶ֥ן <WH7121> bewray ל֖וֹ וְיֹ֥אכַל <WH398> him that he may eat לָֽחֶם׃ <WH3899> bread

וַיּ֥וֹאֶל <WH2974> was content מֹשֶׁ֖ה <WH4872> And Moses לָשֶׁ֣בֶת <WH3427> to dwell אֶת־ <WH854> with הָאִ֑ישׁ <WH376> with the man וַיִּתֵּ֛ן <WH5414> and he gave אֶת־ <WH853> צִפֹּרָ֥ה <WH6855> Zipporah בִתּ֖וֹ <WH1323> his daughter לְמֹשֶֽׁה׃ <WH4872> Moses

וַתֵּ֣לֶד <WH3205> And she bare בֵּ֔ן <WH1121> [him] a son וַיִּקְרָ֥א <WH7121> and he called אֶת־ <WH853> שְׁמ֖וֹ <WH8034> his name גֵּרְשֹׁ֑ם <WH1647> Gershom כִּ֣י <WH3588> for אָמַ֔ר <WH559> for he said גֵּ֣ר <WH1616> I have been a stranger הָיִ֔יתִי <WH1961> have been בְּאֶ֖רֶץ <WH776> land נָכְרִיָּֽה׃ <WH5237> in a strange פ

וַיְהִי֩ <WH1961> came בַיָּמִ֨ים <WH3117> of time הָֽרַבִּ֜ים <WH7227> many הָהֵ֗ם <WH1992> those וַיָּ֙מָת֙ <WH4191> died מֶ֣לֶךְ <WH4428> that the king מִצְרַ֔יִם <WH4714> of Egypt וַיֵּאָנְח֧וּ <WH584> sighed בְנֵֽי־ <WH1121> and the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֛ל <WH3478> of Israel מִן־ <WH4480> by reason of הָעֲבֹדָ֖ה <WH5656> the bondage וַיִּזְעָ֑קוּ <WH2199> and they cried וַתַּ֧עַל <WH5927> came up שַׁוְעָתָ֛ם <WH7775> and their cry אֶל־ <WH413> to הָאֱלֹהִ֖ים <WH430> unto God מִן־ <WH4480> because הָעֲבֹדָֽה׃ <WH5656> by reason of the bondage

וַיִּשְׁמַ֥ע <WH8085> heard אֱלֹהִ֖ים <WH430> And God אֶת־ <WH853> נַאֲקָתָ֑ם <WH5009> their groaning וַיִּזְכֹּ֤ר <WH2142> remembered אֱלֹהִים֙ <WH430> and God אֶת־ <WH853> בְּרִית֔וֹ <WH1285> his covenant אֶת־ <WH854> with אַבְרָהָ֖ם <WH85> with Abraham אֶת־ <WH854> for יִצְחָ֥ק <WH3327> with Isaac וְאֶֽת־ <WH854> for יַעֲקֹֽב׃ <WH3290> and with Jacob
וַיַּ֥רְא <WH7200> looked אֱלֹהִ֖ים <WH430> And God אֶת־ <WH853> בְּנֵ֣י <WH1121> upon the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <WH3478> of Israel וַיֵּ֖דַע <WH3045> had respect אֱלֹהִֽים׃ <WH430> and God ס
